rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0001
rows.name:
This is wrong.
Humanity should have died out along with the Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0002
rows.name:
We should have let nature take its course
and accepted our fate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0003
rows.name: You don't believe that, Lao.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you did, you would have never volunteered
to work on Project Exodus in the first place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0005
rows.name: Or on the White Whale's crew![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0006
rows.name:
I was a believer, once...
I honestly thought we could pull it off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0007
rows.name:
I knew we couldn't save everyone, of course.
Billions of people, in that timeframe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0008
rows.name: But a cross-section of races? Religions? Yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0009
rows.name:
It felt like all the usual politics disappeared.
People from different countries HAD to come together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0010
rows.name:
There was no other choice—this was survival!
So I signed up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0011
rows.name: So what happened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0012
rows.name: It was all LIES![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0013
rows.name:
If you weren't rich, or connected, or part of
the first world elite, you got left to die on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0014
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0015
rows.name: Oh yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0016
rows.name:
The only reason people like you and me
got on board the White Whale[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0017
rows.name:
is because they could use our skills.
Exploit our talents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0018
rows.name:
But everyone else? All those countless souls
boxed up in your precious Lifehold Core?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0019
rows.name:
The same elitist bastards that decided
they're the only part of humanity worth saving.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0020
rows.name: No...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0021
rows.name: If you don't believe me...ask Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0022
rows.name: I can't say I agreed with how all the passengers were chosen...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0023
rows.name:
but I hardly see how it justifies this madness.
We were acting to save the human race.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0024
rows.name: I never understood why humans separate themselves off...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0025
rows.name:
By race, by class, religion, country, age...
As if it matters in the end![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0026
rows.name: On a genetic level, the differences are insignificant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0027
rows.name: No, not insignificant. Not to humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0028
rows.name: But really, how could you understand, Elma?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0030
rows.name:
Sorry, but I won't let those bastards
purge what made us human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0031
rows.name: I'll kill us all first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0032
rows.name: Lao, look—I admit I had no idea about any of this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0033
rows.name: but killing what's left of us isn't going to solve anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0033_2
rows.name: It's you playing god instead of them![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0034
rows.name: How is that fair?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0035
rows.name: Don't talk to me about "fair"...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0035_2
rows.name: Is it fair what happened to my wife and little girl?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0037
rows.name: That's why I volunteered...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0038
rows.name:
I didn't sign up for Project Exodus because
I wanted to save the human race... No...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0039
rows.name:
I signed up for Project Exodus...
because I wanted to save my family...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0040
rows.name:
We knew there were no guarantees
we'd be chosen, of course...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0040_2
rows.name: We promised each other we'd accept our fate, either way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0041
rows.name:
But at least, this way, we had a chance.
...We had something to hope for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0042
rows.name: Hope was all we asked for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0043
rows.name: But there was never any hope. Not really.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0044
rows.name:
The decision was already made...
We just didn't know it yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0044_02
rows.name: These scum DESERVE TO DIE, Elma![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0045
rows.name: No one deserves to die, Lao.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0046
rows.name: Tell that to Charmaine! And Chenshi![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0047
rows.name:
Tell it to everyone we left back on Earth!
...And you KNEW.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0048
rows.name: You knew they’d sealed the fate of all those people...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0049
rows.name:
and then you lied—you LIED about why no one
could know who made it onto the ship until after launch![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0050
rows.name:
The decision came down to saving
a subset of humanity or total extinction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0051
rows.name: I stand by that decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0052
rows.name: And I'd do it again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0053
rows.name: Enough talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0053_2
rows.name:
I don't expect you to agree with
every decision that was made in the past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0054
rows.name: But I won't let you destroy humanity's future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0062
rows.name: Fair enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11090100_MSG0062_2
rows.name: I don't expect you to agree either, but that won't stop me![ST:wait ]
